info.official_title: Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation From an HLA-partially Matched Related or Unrelated Donor After TCR αβ+T Cells/CD19+ B Cell Depletion in Children and Young Adults Affected by Malignant or Non-Malignant Hematological Disorders

identified_line.line: 7. Lansky/Karnofsky score > 50;
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have maximum age of 60 Years
6. The donor and recipient must be identical, as determined by high resolution typing, in at least one allele of each of the following genetic loci: HLA-A, HLA-B, HLA-Cw, and HLA-DRB1;

identified_line.line: 2. Life expectancy > 10 weeks;

9. Male and female subjects of childbearing potential must agree to use an effective means of birth control to avoid pregnancy throughout the transplant procedure, while on immunosuppression, and if the subject experiences any chronic GvHD.

requirement.requirement_type: agreement to use effective birth control

identified_line.line: 4. Patients with life-threatening hematological malignancies and non-malignant disorders that could benfit from HSCT;

criterions.exact_snippets: non-malignant disorders that could benfit from HSCT

or_criteria.exact_snippets: non-malignant disorders that could benfit from HSCT

identified_line.line: 1. Age < 60 years and > 1 month;
3. Patients deemed eligible for allogeneic HSCT per institutional guidelines;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients deemed eligible for allogeneic HSCT per institutional guidelines
Patients deemed eligible for allogeneic HSCT per institutional guidelines

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients deemed eligible for allogeneic HSCT per institutional guidelines
Patients deemed eligible for allogeneic HSCT per institutional guidelines

identified_line.line: Must have minimum age of 1 Month

criterions.exact_snippets: Must have minimum age of 1 Month

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Must have minimum age of 1 Month

identified_line.line: 8. Signed written informed consent;
5. A minimum genotypic identical match of 5/10 is required;

criterions.exact_snippets: A minimum genotypic identical match of 5/10 is required

and_criteria.exact_snippets: A minimum genotypic identical match of 5/10 is required

identified_line.line: 7. Lack of patient's/parents'/guardian's informed consent;
5. Current active infectious disease (including positive HIV serology or viral RNA);

criterions.exact_snippets: positive HIV serology or viral RNA
positive HIV serology or viral RNA

or_criteria.exact_snippets: positive HIV serology or viral RNA
positive HIV serology or viral RNA

identified_line.line: 2. Greater than Grade II acute GvHD or severe, unmanaged chronic extensive GvHD due to a previous allograft at the time of inclusion;

criterions.exact_snippets: Greater than Grade II acute GvHD
due to a previous allograft at the time of inclusion
due to a previous allograft at the time of inclusion

due to a previous allograft at the time of inclusion

due to a previous allograft at the time of inclusion

identified_line.line: 4. Severe cardiovascular disease (arrhythmias requiring chronic treatment, congestive heart failure or left ventricular ejection fraction < 30%);
3. Dysfunction of liver (ALT/AST > 10 times upper normal value, or direct bilirubin > 3 times upper normal value), or unmanageable dysfunction of renal function;

criterions.exact_snippets: Dysfunction of liver (ALT/AST > 10 times upper normal value, or direct bilirubin > 3 times upper normal value)
Dysfunction of liver (ALT/AST > 10 times upper normal value, or direct bilirubin > 3 times upper normal value)
Dysfunction of liver (ALT/AST > 10 times upper normal value, or direct bilirubin > 3 times upper normal value)

identified_line.line: 6. Serious concurrent uncontrolled medical disorders;
8. Any severe concurrent disease which, in the judgement of the sponsor-investigator, would place the patient at increased risk during participation in the study.

criterions.exact_snippets: which, in the judgement of the sponsor-investigator, would place the patient at increased risk during participation in the study
criterions.criterion: increased risk during participation in the study (as judged by sponsor-investigator)

identified_line.line: 1. Pregnant or lactating females;
